name: Oatmeal Cookies with Dried Fruit

ingredients.name: eggs, or 1 egg plus 2 egg whites

preparation: Combine first 6 ingredients in a small mixing bowl.
Combine margarine, applesauce, sugars and vanilla extract in a large mixing bowl. Add eggs one at a time, beating well after each addition.
Combine wet and dry ingredients. Stir in dried fruit and oats.
Drop dough by heaping teaspoons 3" apart onto Sheet Pan lined with Sheet Pan Liner. Lightly press cookies down with a fork.
Bake for approximately 10–12 minutes, or until lightly browned around edges.
tips: To reduce fat content in your favourite baking recipes, substitute applesauce for some of the fat.

products.name: Sheet Pan
summary: Lightweight all-purpose baking sheet made from a single piece of aluminum, with a one-inch rim.

products.name: Sheet Pan Liner
summary: Nonstick silicone baking sheet. Ideal for baking, roasting, sheet pan meals & more!
